tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE recording_system_changes (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  change_description STRING,
  change_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  user_id INT
)

CREATE TABLE audit_trail (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    change_time TIMESTAMP,
    change_description TEXT,
    user_id INT,
    device_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE recordings (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id UUID,
    action TEXT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    details JSONB
);

CREATE TABLE network_configuration (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    device_id UUID,
    setting TEXT,
    value TEXT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE audit_trail (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id UUID,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    action TEXT,
    table_affected TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE changes_log (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    change_id UUID,
    table_affected TEXT,
    field_changed TEXT,
    previous_value TEXT,
    new_value TEXT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);
